description: This file defines the 'AppTheme' class which provides theme configurations for a Flutter app, including a light theme with color schemes, text styles, and component themes, as well as helper functions for background gradients.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing static theme data and style helpers for the application.

methods.name: lightTheme
methods.description: Returns a ThemeData object configured with light color scheme, text themes, and styles suitable for Material 3.

methods.name: backgroundGradient
methods.description: Provides a LinearGradient with a subtle top-to-bottom gradient, theme-adherent.

methods.name: radialHighlight
methods.description: Provides a RadialGradient for highlights, suitable for headers or hero sections.
